content.rendered:
Residential fence installation Central Florida

Tailored residential fence installation solutions for your home that perfectly balance style and strength.

Get A Fence Quote

Home Residential fence installation in Pasco and Polk County

At Local Choice Fence, we know Pasco and Polk County home’s residential fence installation inside out.

Our fence installations aren’t just barriers; they add beauty and security to your space. Whether it’s for privacy or style, we’d love to be a part of the transformation!

20+ Years of Experience

We're proud to be one of Florida's trusted providers.

High-Quality Fence Services

Our fences are hand-made for extra strength and looks.

Budget-Friendly Fence Options

Get access to dozens of affordable fence styles.

Striving for 100% Satisfaction

Your fence installation isn't a task, it's an honor.

Why choose Local Choice Fence for your residential fence installation?

With a newly installed fence form Local Choice Fence, you’re investing in a durable, beautiful extension of your home.

Choose a design from our expansive collection that mirrors your style, withstands Florida’s dynamic weather, and boosts your home’s value. 

Fence forward with confidence

Let our fencing pros help you choose and install the perfect boundary for your home or business.
Get A Fence Quote

Stunning fence options that catch attention

Every home is unique, and your fence should be too.

Whether you lean towards the classic warmth of wood or the convenience of vinyl, we’re confident there’s an option calling your name.

Warm Traditional Wood

Low Maintenance Vinyl

Elegant Aluminum

Secure Chain Link

Countryside Ranch Rail

Sturdy Cross Buck

Wood and Wire Blend

Versatile Field Fence

Protective Barbed Wire

A fence material for every homeowner's vision

We believe in matching your dream. That’s why we offer a range of quality materials to resonate with your vision.

Let your home stand strong and shine bright, no matter the Florida weather.

★★★★★ 5/5

“The owner of the company really made sure that the job was done correctly and everything that needed to be fixed was fixed without any hesitation or problems!”

Erez

Verified Google Review

Frequently asked questions:

1. Why opt for Local Choice's hand-crafted fences?

Our hand-crafted fences exude unmatched durability and charm, making your residence a local landmark.

2. How do I ensure my fence's longevity amidst Florida's conditions?

Our fences are Florida-weather ready; however, periodic maintenance will amplify its lifespan.

3. How do you cater to specific HOA fencing requirements?

Our expertise encompasses HOA-specific installations, ensuring seamless community integration.

4. What makes your fence financing options standout?

Our tailored financing plans are designed to bring your fencing dreams to reality, irrespective of budget constraints.

5. What distinguishes Local Choice Fence in the fencing market?

Two decades of passion, coupled with our unwavering commitment to quality and client satisfaction, makes us the fencing connoisseur in Florida.

Ready for the perfect fence?

Every property has unique needs. Let’s discuss yours and bring your vision to life with Local Choice Fence.

Contact Us
